title: Remediation Playbook Execution Context Policy Schema
description: Defines mandatory environmental and policy constraints for executing specific remediation playbooks, overriding or supplementing standard safety levels.

policy_version.description: Version of the context policy file.

policies.description: Map of Playbook Identifiers to execution policies.

ExecutionContextPolicy.description: A set of conditions that must be met by the execution environment before the playbook is allowed to launch.

allowed_environments.description: The deployment environments where this playbook is authorized to run.

required_security_tags.description: Specific security labels (e.g., 'FIPS_COMPLIANT', 'HARDENED_ENDPOINT') required of the execution host.

rate_limit_minute.description: Maximum times this playbook can be executed per minute across the fleet.

human_oversight_required_if_context.description: If the execution context metadata matches any of these keywords, mandatory human override is triggered (e.g., ['PRODUCTION', 'CRITICAL_FAILURE'])
